action.description: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JHA with Representative(s) Belatti, Chun, Hussey, Lamosao, Olds, Poepoe voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Alcos, Garcia, Kila, Kong, Matsumoto, Muraoka, Perruso, Pierick, Reyes Oda, Shimizu, Souza voting no (11) and Representative(s) Cochran, Sayama, Ward excused (3).
